title: Low Responsiveness of Machine Learning Models to Critical or Deteriorating Health Conditions
details: TS Pias, S Afrose, M Das Tuli, IH Trisha, X Deng… - medRxiv, 2024
abstract: Abstract Machine learning (ML) based mortality prediction models can be immensely useful in intensive care units. Such a model should generate warnings to alert physicians when a patient's condition rapidly deteriorates or their vitals are in highly …
